pp2.9:1.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati,
pp2.9:1.2_1: tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ.
pp2.9:2.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati,
pp2.9:2.2_1: na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ.
pp2.9:3.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.9:4.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.9:5.2_0: Idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.9:6.3_1: tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā,
pp2.9:6.3_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
pp2.9:7.3_1: tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya vodiṭṭhā honti vocaritā,
pp2.9:7.3_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
pp2.9:8.2_0: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa paññindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
pp2.9:8.4_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dhammānusārī, phale ṭhito diṭṭhippatto.
pp2.9:9.2_0: Yassa puggalassa sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannassa saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hoti,
pp2.9:9.4_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo saddhānusārī, phale ṭhito saddhāvimuttoti.
